page.title: 08BRYN-TRANSPORT
page.content: BRYN SITUATED BETWEEN PORT TALBOT AND MAESTEG HAS ONE MAIN ROAD PASSING THROUGH IT,THE B4282.RESIDENTS USE THE LLYNFI BUS,OTHER FORMS OF TRANBSPORT INCLUDE CARS,MOTORBIKES AND BICYCLES.IT IS NOT UNCOMMON FOR PEOPLE TO WALK.THE BUS SERVICE IS HOURLY,THE FARES-ADULT:95p;CHILDREN:60p,RETURN. THERE IS A REPAIR SERVICE GARAGE FOR LLYNFI IN THE VILLAGE.BUSES ARE BLUE & WHITE.THE SCHOOL USES THEIR COACHES FOR TRIPS,EDUCATIONAL VISITS AND SPORTING ACTIVITIES.THE CHARGE TO THE AFAN LIDO IS Â£16.00.THE FIRM LETS US HAVE TRANSPORT AT CUT PRICE. WITH THE THREAT TO THE GOVERNMENT SUBSIDIES THERE IS EVERY POSSIBILITY THAT A SMALL LOCAL COMPANY,LIKE LLYNFI,WILL NOT BE ABLE TO SURVIVIE.
